what: Apply SRTR factor labels to a data frame — apply_srtr_factors
title: Apply SRTR factor labels to a data frame — apply_srtr_factors
text: Converts coded variables SRTR dataset human-readable factors using SRTR data dictionary associated format tables.

title: Apply SRTR factor labels to a data frame — apply_srtr_factors
Apply SRTR factor labels to a data frame — apply_srtr_factors
text: df data frame loaded SRTR SAF file. file_key Optional. dataset name (e.g., "CAND_KIPA", "TX_KI"). provided, inferred object name df. verbose Logical. TRUE, print variable labeled.

title: Apply SRTR factor labels to a data frame — apply_srtr_factors
text: data frame factor levels applied coded variables.

title: Apply SRTR factor labels to a data frame — apply_srtr_factors
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Explicit file_key df <- read_sas("TX_KI.sas7bdat") df <- apply_srtr_factors(df, file_key = "TX_KI", verbose = TRUE)  # Implicit file_key inferred from object name TX_KI <- read_sas("TX_KI.sas7bdat") TX_KI <- apply_srtr_factors(TX_KI, verbose = TRUE) } # }

what: Load an SRTR file and optionally apply labels — load_srtr_file
title: Load an SRTR file and optionally apply labels — load_srtr_file
text: Loads file SRTR dataset registry optionally applies: Factor labels using formats dataset Variable labels using dictionary dataset

title: Load an SRTR file and optionally apply labels — load_srtr_file
code: load_srtr_file(   file_key,   factor_labels = TRUE,   var_labels = FALSE,   col_select = NULL,   ... )

title: Load an SRTR file and optionally apply labels — load_srtr_file
text: file_key Character. Canonical dataset key (e.g., "TX_LI", "CAND_KIPA"). factor_labels Logical. Whether apply factor labels. Default = TRUE. var_labels Logical. Whether apply variable labels. Default = FALSE. col_select Optional. Tidyselect expression character vector selecting columns. ... Additional arguments passed file reader (e.g., as_factor read_sas()).

title: Load an SRTR file and optionally apply labels — load_srtr_file
text: tibble loaded file contents, optionally labeled.

title: Load an SRTR file and optionally apply labels — load_srtr_file
text: variable names standardized uppercase loading.

title: Load an SRTR file and optionally apply labels — load_srtr_file
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ df <- load_srtr_file("TX_LI", factor_labels = TRUE, var_labels = TRUE) } # }

what: Set the SRTR working directory — set_SRTR_wd
title: Set the SRTR working directory — set_SRTR_wd
text: Sets SRTR working directory current session, optionally saves permanently user's .Renviron file environment variable SRTR_WD.

title: Set the SRTR working directory — set_SRTR_wd
Set the SRTR working directory — set_SRTR_wd
text: path Path SRTR data folder permanent Logical; TRUE, appends setting .Renviron persistence

title: Set the SRTR working directory — set_SRTR_wd
text: normalized path, invisibly

title: Set the SRTR working directory — set_SRTR_wd
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ set_SRTR_wd("C:/Data/SRTR")          # Session only set_SRTR_wd("C:/Data/SRTR", TRUE)    # Persistent across sessions } # }
